@@ -27,9 +27,10 @@
 
 // map API → Blogcard2 props
 function toCard2(b: Blog) {
   return {
-    id: b.slug,                         // Blogcard2 links use post.id
+    id: b.slug,    
+    slug: b.slug,                       // Blogcard2 links use post.id
     imgSrc: b.mainImage?.url || "",
     date: fmtDate(b.createdAt),
     author: b.postedBy || "",
     title: b.title,
